actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to eliminate automatic adjustments of rates of pay for Members of the Congress under the Federal Salary Act of 1967 and the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to make the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay for Members of Congress advisory only. Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to establish the rates of pay for Members of Congress as those in effect on September 30, 1976.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate automatic adjustments of rates of pay for Members of the Congress under the Federal Salary Act of 1967 and the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.
